subTag: Present Worth and Net Present and Benefit Value
situation: A new plant to produce steel tubing requires an initial investment of $10 M. It is expected that after 3 years of operation an additional investment of $5 M will be required and after 6 years of operation another investment of $3 M. Annual operating costs will be $3 M and annual revenue will be $8 M. The life of the plant is 10 years. If the interest rate is 15% per year, compounded annually, what is net present value (NPV) of this plant?
